sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"证据，见证"之意。
means: proof ： 指足以直接证明某事为某事实的依据，侧重作为充分证据所导致的结果。
evidence ： 普通用词，在法律上指能起证明作用的，如证明、公证书以及所有的实物东西等。在生活中指任何一样可证明某一件事的真实性的东西。
witness ： 指证据或证人，尤指后者，且有亲眼见到之意。
testimony ： 指证据、证词，多系法律用语。

sentence.Network_en: He found evidence of mutated forms of the gene.
sentence.Network_cn: 他找到了该基因出现了变异形式的证据。

sentence.Network_en: He based his conclusions on the evidence given by the captured prisoners.
sentence.Network_cn: 他根据被俘囚犯提供的证据得出了这个结论。

sentence.Network_en: This evidence supports their contention that the outbreak of violence was prearranged.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一证据证实了他们的观点，即此次突发暴力事件是有预谋的。

TOEFL词频表 - 豆丁网 ... evident 明显的，显然的 evidence 明显，证据 viscera 内脏.

list.abs: 物证（physical evidence）（Physical Evidence）： 包括服务供给得以顺利传送的服务环境， 有形商品承载和表达服务的能力，当前消费者的无形消费体验…
4． 实行有形展示（Physical Evidence）策略通过有形因素向消费者展示无形服务的特点、层次等，即服务营销中的有形展示。

间接证据 (circumstantial evidence) 的主要难题是，如果间接证据有任何表明清白的可能性，控方负有举证责任排除这种可能性。这对 …
法律英语专业词汇汇总 ... 受害人 victim 书证 documentary evidence 司法部 Ministry of Justice.

jx.jx_en_mean: (Law)give information and answer questions formally and in person in a law court or at an inquiry

phrase.cizu_name: turn King's (或 Queen's 或美state's) evidence

jx.jx_en_mean: (Law)(of a criminal) give information in court against one's partners in order to receive a less severe punishment oneself
jx.jx_cn_mean: (律)（罪犯）供出对同案犯不利的证据；作告发同案犯的证人
显而易见的；很明显被看见的

lj.lj_ly: It was early, and few pedestrians were in evidence on the city streets.
lj.lj_ls: 天还很早，城市街道上的稀少行人清晰可见

jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【法律】} 作为法律上的证据

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin evidentia, from evident- 'obvious to the eye or mind' (see evident)

encyclopedia.content: 释义 Evidence — 证据 代码的属性，如数字签名或其原位置的区域或站点，它们由安全策略用来给代码授予权限。另请参见：安全策略。 —————————————————————————————————————————————— 玛丽莲曼森同名歌曲 Evidence 痕迹 歌手： Marilyn Manson You have eyes that 你的眼睛 Lead me on 引导着我 And a body that 你的身体 Shows me death 展示给我死亡 Your lips look like they we

entry.def: Evidence is anything that you see, experience, read, or are told that causes you to believe that something is true or has really happened.

example.ex: Ganley said he'd seen no evidence of widespread fraud...
example.tran: 甘利说他没有看见诈骗泛滥的证据。

example.ex: There is a lot of evidence that stress is partly responsible for disease...
example.tran: 有很多证据证明压力是造成疾病的原因之一。

entry.def: Evidence is the information which is used in a court of law to try to prove something. Evidence is obtained from documents, objects, or witnesses.

example.ex: The evidence against him was purely circumstantial.
example.tran: 对他不利的这项证据完全是间接证据。

entry.def: If you give evidence in a court of law or an official enquiry, you officially say what you know about people or events, or describe an occasion at which you were present.

example.ex: The forensic scientists who carried out the original tests will be called to give evidence...
example.tran: 进行最初化验的法医学家将被传唤到庭作证。

example.ex: Cabin crew have been giving evidence at the M1 aircrash enquiry.
example.tran: 机舱人员一直在为M1空难调查作证。

entry.def: If a particular feeling, ability, or attitude is evidenced by something or someone, it is seen or felt.

example.ex: He's wise in other ways too, as evidenced by his reason for switching from tennis to golf...
example.tran: 他在其他方面同样明智，这一点可以从他不打网球改打高尔夫的理由中得到证明。

example.ex: She was not calculating and evidenced no specific interest in money.
example.tran: 她没什么心计，而且能感觉出她对钱没什么兴趣。

entry.def: If someone or something is in evidence, they are present and can be clearly seen.

example.ex: Poverty and bad housing conditions are still very much in evidence.
example.tran: 贫困和糟糕的住房条件仍很常见。

means.word_mean: 1. your basis for belief or disbelief; knowledge on which to base belief;

sentences.sentence: "the evidence that smoking causes lung cancer is very compelling"

means.word_mean: 2. an indication that makes something evident;

sentences.sentence: "his trembling was evidence of his fear"

means.word_mean: 3. (law) all the means by which any alleged matter of fact whose truth is investigated at judicial trial is established or disproved
1. provide evidence for; stand as proof of; show by one's behavior, attitude, or external attributes;

sentences.sentence: "His high fever attested to his illness"
"The buildings in Rome manifest a high level of architectural sophistication"
"This decision demonstrates his sense of fairness"
"The blood test showed that he was the father"
"he was telling on all his former colleague"

auth_sentence.content: So the evidence at the moment is very disappointing.
auth_sentence.res_content: So the evidence at the moment is very disappointing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So the evidence at the moment is very disappointing.

auth_sentence.content: There's also surprising tinges of electronica in evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's also surprising tinges of electronica in evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's also surprising tinges of electronica in evidence.

auth_sentence.content: We need some good evidence first, he says.
auth_sentence.res_content: We need some good evidence first, he says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We need some good evidence first, he says.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的
e出+vid看,查+ent……的→看出来了→明显的
im不+provident[adj.顾及未来的,有远见的]→adj.不顾将来的,不节俭的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 惹人反感的,招人嫉妒的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+vid看,查+ious……的→看上去不好的→有害的
pro向前+vid看+ent……的→向前看的→有远见的
provide预备,提供+ed→在……前提之下→倘若

stems_affixes.value_cn: 红利,股息;回报,效益;被除数,划分
stems_affixes.word_buile: divide[v.分开]+end→划分,区分[红利,股息也是划分出去的]
in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明显;显著;根据;证据;迹象
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+vid看,查+ence表名词→看出来了→明显
pro向前+vid看+ency表名词→向前看→有远见

stems_affixes.value_cn: 电视, 录象, 视频
stems_affixes.word_buile: vid看,查+eo→n.电视, 录象, 视频

stems_affixes.value_cn: 供应,供给,准备,预防,规定
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前,提前+vid看,查+e→提前看好→预备,提供

Sentence.sentence: Although people around the world may enjoy doing similar things in their free time, there's evidence to suggest that these interests are changing.
Further evidence of McLaughlin's irresponsibility occurred on May 6 when he was returning from his shift
But there is no evidence to show that the structure of eyes is changed by wearing glasses at a young age.

Civilization,then,is fine — people banging away on their smartphones are fluently using a code separate from the one they use in actual writing, and there is no evidence that texting is ruining composition skills.
I am responsible for financial development programs in many parts of the world, so forecasting long range trends and making predictions on the basis of present evidence is what I do.
Both of these things are also about making long-term predictions on the basis of present evidence

means.word_mean: 证词; 证据; 迹象

sentences.en: A scientist must produce evidence in support of a theory.
sentences.cn: 科学家必须提供证据以支持其理论。

sentences.en: The room bore evidence of a struggle.
sentences.cn: 这房间里有搏斗过的迹象。

sentences.en: There wasn't enough evidence to prove him guilty.
sentences.cn: 没有充分的证据证明他有罪。

means.word_mean: 使明显，使明白；显示，显出；表明

sentences.en: She evidenced her approval by promising her full support。
sentences.cn: 她答应全力支持，以此来表明她的赞成。

sentences.en: He evidenced his accusation with some material evidence.
sentences.cn: 他以一些物证作为控告的证据。

jushi.english: There was some evidence that the documents had been tampered with.
jushi.chinese: 有某些证据说明文件已被篡改。

jushi.english: We must produce evidence in support of our theory.
jushi.chinese: 我们必须提出证据以支持我们的理论。

jushi.english: There was enough evidence to prove him guilty.
jushi.chinese: 有充分的证据证明他有罪。
